title: New treatment of acute myeloid leukemia achieves remarkable results in a disease formerly with little hope

title_detail.value: New treatment of acute myeloid leukemia achieves remarkable results in a disease formerly with little hope

summary: A new drug trial has achieved a remarkable result, clearing the bone marrow of leukemia in almost 60 percent of patients.

summary_detail.value: A new drug trial has achieved a remarkable result, clearing the bone marrow of leukemia in almost 60 percent of patients.
